Articles.Content: Ok I found it. Now how do i get them here?

You take pics with the screenshot button

I think the default is f1. I switched it to ` though
Oh.. I did steam screenshots. But i blew all your stuff up with missiles....

HOW!? WHAT!? You actually couldn't destroy a Burai? Of all things a BURAI!? And yet you manage to take down An Icaruga AND a Guren? Whaaaaaat?

You did take out the kerbal pilot, but the ship also has multiple internal probe cores, incase the most vulnerable part of the ship is destroyed (the lander can).
But which is the main 'core'.

Corgi

You just broke a first page rule that should be worthy of disqualification of round

You are suppose to use 4 ships total but use one and only one ship per move and attack one and only one ship pur move

What you did was use one ship and attacked 3 out of four ships.

Luckily I'm in a good mood and am going to reset the battle field. If this happens again though I will ask Spartwo to list this as a automatic loss for you and a victory for me.

Look back at past battles on previous pages (and I mean do it)to see how we do things around here

I will send you the game download as soon as I can get internet connection again
Oh **** Sorry. Im sorry i forgot its turned based xD

My wifi connections being stupid

Re-download my game file and try again

And now you know how to take pics

You can attack the one ship with multiple missiles but not more than one ship

@ Spartwo

The probe is the main core, I wouldn't make the most vital part of my ship the most vulnerable one.

@ Zekes

Actually, you might be surprised how close my new Prototype is to a Drek, and how different a Burai actually is.

HOW!? WHAT!? You actually couldn't destroy a Burai? Of all things a BURAI!? And yet you manage to take down An Icaruga AND a Guren? Whaaaaaat?

You did take out the kerbal pilot, but the ship also has multiple internal probe cores, incase the most vulnerable part of the ship is destroyed (the lander can).

It would have worked better if I'd aimed for the engines, but I was too concerned with trying to make it explode. xD

http://www./view/u43m4sivmga60sj/persistent.sfs

I got internet working again

Here you go Corgi

Actually, you did take out the engine, making my final shots just that much harder.

Okay, Turn 3: http://www./download/izyw65h2eog1aei/persistent.sfs

The images say all:

http://imgur.com/a/PCcgV#0

Edited November 2, 2013 by Deathsoul097
Did you mean this deathsoul?

@_@ no.

I meant an Imgur ALBUM, not just a single image. I can do that. I'm not that helpless.

Also, you might want to remove that image. I now know your email address.

Edited November 2, 2013 by Deathsoul097

Try this:

Not working.

Edited November 2, 2013 by Deathsoul097
I cannot battle right now because i am having a friend come over. I might do it later or tomorrow.
wow sry War I was working we are trying to get some counters assembled before we ship them to Virginia and North Carolina. Long day. Ill take my turn now.

Not working.

you only put in the code not the part with http.etc

Well at least I know mods are ok with this thread(also how it got moved twice)
?? I don't understand what you mean. I think I might and then I read it again and I just think; whaaa? Could you please clarify, or post an example?

wow sry War I was working we are trying to get some counters assembled before we ship them to Virginia and North Carolina. Long day. Ill take my turn now.

No worries

[imgur]pccgv[/imgur]

And this thread is okay as long as no rules are broke

OK her you go took it at an angle skipped the missile off your armor plate and rammed it right into the Kerbin cockpit. Waste of o larger missile the the dead is done.

The brave pilot now floats endlessly in space, alone and running out of O2.
Kerbals breathe?
I would assume because they use environment suits. Even on other planets.
